text: The Core is a 2003 science fiction action directed by Jon Amiel and starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Delroy Lindo, Stanley Tucci, Bruce Greenwood, Alfre Woodard, Richard Jenkins. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. In the credits, the music video presented by Echelon from Thirty Seconds to Mars. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2003 action movies Category:2003 science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:British action movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:Canadian action movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Dutch action movies Category:Dutch science fiction movies Category:Movies set in Alaska Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in Rome Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Utah Category:Movies about scientists Category:Movies about nuclear technology Category:Movies directed by Jon Amiel
title: The Core
